=Templates=

Templates in VosaoCMS are used to arrange web design with page content.

For templates rendering Vosao uses Velocity engine.

Basic simple template looks like:
{{{
<html>
<head>
  <title>$page.title</title>
</head>  
<body>

$page.content

</body>

</html>
}}}

=== Template variables ===

*Current page*

 * String page.title  
 * String page.friendlyUrl
 * String page.content

*Site global configuration*

 * String config.googleAnalyticsId
 * String config.siteEmail
 * String config.siteDomain

*Helper service*

 * Page service.findPage(url) - find page by friendly url
 * List<Pages> service.findPageChildren(url) - find all child pages of specified page by url
   _usage example_
   {{{
     #foreach($p in $service.findPageChildren("/blogs")
       <h1 class="blog-title">$p.title</h1>
       <div class="blog-entry">$p.content</div>
     #end
   }}}
